| HistoryText             = 
Four best of friends who all went to the same schools and got kicked out of them. When entering a race in the desert, they became separated from the rest of the racers and met the [[First Fallen (Earth-616)|First Fallen]]. Jamie fled and was captured by drug dealing gangsters he had crossed previously. The First Fallen chose the Foursaken to live in his world where 4 of every species lived in peace and harmony. The catch was that the world they originally came from was frozen in time forever.

Jamie resurrected [[Elizabeth Braddock (Earth-616)|Psylocke]] to battle the First Fallen, but in the end sacrificed himself to save the world.{{r|Uncanny X-Men #473|474}}
